Dialogue.Page: Hey, new recruit, nice to meet you!

DialogueOption.Text: How's it living on Icy Ridges?
What was it like when the other settlement burned down?

Dialogue.Page: I'm surprised you've never heard of me, I'm Carp, and I'm the scientist that predicted the ice age.
I've been studying the climate on Icy Ridges too, and it's been having very similar anomalies to those on Warm Embrace, but reversed.
Heat just appears in the atmosphere, as if being summoned into existence!
There was more, but I get forgetful in my age, and all my observations were lost when West Settlement burned down.
I hope I didn't discover anything really important.
It could be worse. I remember that second winter back on Warm Embrace, when it was so cold it felt like there was nothing I could do to get warm.
That was the hardest time of my life. Compared to that, this isn't so bad.
Well, except for the lightning tornadoes.
Wow, you just come right out with the hard questions, huh?
I was actually there when it happened, I used to live there.
At first it seemed like just a normal day, but then things felt... off.
This strange static filled the air, and everything got real still for a moment.
Then I saw it descending right onto a building! That terrible twisting thing.
We all huddled in the radio house because it was the furthest building from it, someone manned the radio and called for help.
I was so worried the interference would make it impossible to get a signal out, but thankfully someone heard us.
Minnow arrived, and Bass shortly after and loaded everybody on.
